label: Soft
description: Access granted with Alarm event 'Anti-passback violation'

label: Semi Soft
description: 1st event - Access denied with Alarm event 'Anti-passback violation'. 2nd event - Access granted

label: Hard
description: Access denied with Alarm event 'Anti-passback violation'

label: Extra Hard
description: Access denied with Alarm event 'Anti-passback violation' and set Cardholder inactive
